sentence.text: A homozygous mutation of negative regulation of endopeptidase activity, a gene encoding an intracellular protease inhibitor, has recently been associated with post-lingual, autosomal-recessive, nonsyndromic hearing loss in humans (DFNB91).
These findings establish these mutant mice as a suitable model system to elucidate how negative regulation of endopeptidase activity deficiency causes deafness in humans
